Tidy a survival survfit object

Source: R/vr_est_kaplan_meier.R
vr_est_kaplan_meier.Rd

This function tidies a Surv object using broom tidy function. The function expects a data frame and the equation for the survival model.

vr_est_kaplan_meier(data, equation)

Arguments

data

input data frame for the KM analysis.
euqation

Survival equation that defines the analysis.

Value

tidy data frame (tibble) using the broom tidy function.

Examples

library(survival)
vr_est_kaplan_meier(lung, "Surv(time, status) ~ sex")
#> # A tibble: 206 x 9
#>     time n.risk n.event n.censor estimate std.error conf.high conf.low strata
